name: example
author: IFC.js
description: This library is the implementation of [web-ifc](https://github.com/tomvandig/web-ifc) for [THREE.js](https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/). This is the official IFCLoader of Three.js.

scripts.copy-files: cpy ./node_modules/web-ifc/web-ifc.wasm dist && cpy ./node_modules/web-ifc/web-ifc-mt.wasm dist && cpy ./node_modules/web-ifc-three/IFCWorker.js dist && cpy ./node_modules/web-ifc-three/IFCWorker.js.map dist
